content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i traveled to cape breton in the winter of 2008 to visit my ailing grandfather, in nova scotia, canada.  he had been suffering from serious dementia, so it prevented us ever seeing him this particular weekend.  in order to make the best of our time, we decided to do some snowboarding, hiking, and a bit sightseeing.  on our way home from the membertou reservation in sydney late one night, rather, early in the morning, maybe 2am,  we were traveling on the transcanada highway just outside of ross ferry and as my girlfriend was driving i per-chanced to notice a massive triangular formation of what looked like three stars all moving in unison across the entire expanse of sky.  from one side of the horizon to the other.  i can't tell you from what direction it came or where it traveled to since the area was a little unfamiliar to me.  i originally thought that this was some kind of team, in formation, perhaps a team of satellites flying in formation on some kind of joint space mission, as i've seen satellites before but these were significantly brighter than satellites. i had also never heard of a fleet of satellites flying together like this and i try and pay attention to science news.  my second thought was that this was some sort of massive solid object, but couldn't confirm this as it was difficult to see whether stars could be seen passing behind the formation in the moving car. unfortunately my girlfriend can't corroborate my sighting, as she never did see the formation, but can corroborate the event taking place.  i got her eventually pull the car over for her to witness this amazing sight but by that time, whatever it was that i had seen had already disappeared over the horizon.  
then today, as i checked the updates from your newsletter and watched the footage of the triangular ufo seen in michigan i was dumbfounded because this object, or rather objects (?)  was (were) identical to the one that i had seen!  it seemed to be the same size in reference to passing stars and in the identical type of configuration with one star seeming to slightly off making it more of an isosceles triangle rather than an equilateral triangle.  it was so comforting to to know that this event was actually documented by someone, and in video.  brilliant video i may add!
this was not the first time i had witnessed strange sky anomalies but rather one of many that i have been lucky enough to have witnessed  over the course of my life. my first also taking place in cape breton when i was twelve with my father and sister on a sunset fishing trip.  my most recent sighting, however has been my most impressive, in newfoundland, canada, (another canadian island...Interesting...) this past summer in gros morne national park, which my girlfriend was also witness too. there was similar sighting mentioned by a listener who wrote in to you, describing it's exit as being like the 'star trek warp drive'. but that's another story however.  love the program, keep up the good work.  can't wait for the next episode.
content.summary: Large triangular formation- 3 separate craft in perfect triangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
This report is being transposed by morgan beall (mufon investigator) direct from witness at his residence.

9-9-2009
witnessed two pairs of lights near my back yard in empty lots that are wooded. the lights seemed to dance and moved between trees and brush. once i stepped out they both pointed directly at me as if the lights were mounted on a helmet or head. the lights were amber in color and round.

10-25-2009

9:30pm witnessed strange lights moving through wooded areas near my residence moving in and out of the tree coverage. sighting lasted about a minute. video was taken of this event. one light was due west about 300 yards from my property.

10-29-2009

noticed strange lights in the sky, east horizon. the first light traveled in from the sky at about a 45 degree angle and stopped suddenly. about a minute later a second light streaked in from the south and also stopped suddenly. at about this time i started taping the event. about 2 to 3 minutes later the third light came in from the north and streaked in is 3 separate busts of speed. once all three lights were in a triangle formation they seemed to instantly inch towards the middle of the formation as if it "docked". the formation of lights then slowly started to drift down towards the ground. the formation of lights then seemed to quickly shift a few degrees instantly. a second witness my wife witnessed this and quickly went back into the house. at this point i could hear a helicopter approaching from the south. the helicopter seemed to approach the formation of lights and or between me and the lights. the helicopter also flew directly over my house and circled the house after i pointed the camcorder at it with its ir light on about three times. the objects eventually went up slowly and started to separate and disappeared over a long period of time.

the helicopter returned the next night but flew in one direction.

11-3-2009

about 1:25sm in the morning we heard noses in the back yard. sun in law and myself went to the backyard. we could hear noises and braches braking. my sun in law pointed his light in the shrubs and we saw what looked like a pal white skin arm grasping a branch. it seemed to duck the light and hide but we should still see the hand and part of the arm. we froze and went into a sort of shock and returned to the house quickly returned to the house and did not go back outside. the hand seemed to have a total of 4 digits, 3 fingers and one thumb the center finger was longer the other two fingers. the skin was pale gray.
content.summary: Witnessed  possible alien being and witnessed unexplained light formation.

content.detailedDescription: When leaving the address listed above with my significant other as a witness to this sighting, looking up in the sky as i always do i saw a cigar shaped shinny object . with no wings. it traveled from the south to the north at a very slow pace. there was no sound, the object appeared low enough for us to hear any noise however there was no sound.After three minutes the cigar shaped object disappeared. we felt excited upon viewing the object.  disappointed we did not have time to take a picture of what we observed.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object seen in sky on a clear night

content.detailedDescription:
On a train, spotted odd looking object in sky smaller than a plane. thinking that must be a helicopter at an odd angle, i kept staring.  the object seemed to turn, and caught the sunlight on its surface.  colour was between a grey and white.   it turned and i saw clearly that it was a saucer.  i lost sight of it as my train pulled into the station.

i felt excited and privileged to see it.
content.summary: Spotted a saucer in the sky above the clapham junction area

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down stewartstown road in morgantown west virginia. i believe it was around march of 2006. it was sometime in the afternoon. it was daylight out. out of the corner of my eye to my right, there was a streak/flash of colors that quickly came and disappeared. i am guessing the distance was about a mile away and it was not very high in the sky. all i saw was a trail of colors - yellow, orange, red, green, blue - like a trail of gasses. i did not see an acutal object, just the streak of colors, and they disappeared as quickly as they came. it lasted just a few seconds. it went from right to left and at a slight angle upward towards the sky. i've never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Flash of colors across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
11/4/09
 i have never told anyone about seeing a ufo before, because it would be a story no person would ever believe. i have now decided to tell what i saw, after all of the evidence and eyewitness reports of other sightings by people over the years. the event happened when i was 18 years old, on a clear day with excellent visibility around 12 noon. unfortunately, there was no eye witness with me.
 during the summer of 1947, i was in the kitchen of my grandparent's house when i noticed a shadow suddenly flash across the house. in a couple of seconds, i was at the window staring at a flying saucer moving directly away from me and heading towards berrela mesa. i had never seen such a strange machine like this before. the saucer dove downward towards some strange looking sandstone outcroppings on the side of the mesa, and then nosed up to clear the mesa's rim. i was able to get a good view of the edge and top of the saucer before it made a turn to the right, and then flew south out of sight. there was no sound at all...Not even a sonic boom. the saucer traveled extremely fast.
 here is my estimate of the size, appearance, and time of arrival to the rim of the mesa: the diameter of the ufo was about 60 feet, and the height of the bell-shaped bubble area was about 6 feet above the base. the ufo looked metalic with no windows. the distance to the mesa rim from my vantage point is about 4 miles, and the time for it to arrive there took about 12 seconds. therefore; the estimated speed had to be in the vicinity of mach 2.
 at first, i thought i was hallucinating. since i was of sound mind with excellent senses, the strange event i witnessed had to be real.
content.summary: A ufo sighting at raton, n.M.

content.detailedDescription: As i mentioned in a previous entry i enjoy star gazing, the other night was one i will never forget. also i have mentioned that i have been seeing large stationary orb/circle shaped lights about the size of an aspirin in the night sky. these have been just fading out, and i have been seeing things out of the corner of my eye but when i turn they're gone. well last night i found out why, i was looking at a group of 3 stars in a triangle shape, it stood out to me because of how perfectly even it was. i looked away for a second and when i came back to the stars one of them was moving away slowly from the other 2. after about 5 seconds it flared up like the lights i have been seeing then just disappeared again. there is no way this was an airplane or helicopter or satellite, it was with the other stars for a good while, perfectly still then moved away in a direction away from the direction of the stars rotation which from my point is left to right on an upward motion in the sky, from 7 o'clock to 1 o'clock approx. this is the same fade out i have described before. on oct 30 there was also a sighting but this time there was a vapor trail after it disappeared. the trail appeared instantly across the sky when the object had totally faded out, the weird thing about this trail was it evaporated all at the same time, not like normal ones do, which fade out from the oldest point first, it disappeared all at once after several minutes. this was easy to see on a clear night with nearly a full moon. the night of the 3rd had a full moon and was clear as well.
content.summary: I've been seeing stationary orbs but this time it tricked me and moved

content.detailedDescription:
It was today (11/4)at 5:20 this morning.  i was driving alone in my car on my way to work.  i had a full eight hours sleep the night before, so wasn't groggy, and i am a middle-aged woman who doesn't do drugs and drinks little.  this is the route i have taken every morning for years at the same time to get to work.  i know every cell tower, street lamp and other light along the basically dark route.  the highway i travel has no lights other than vehicular headlights, and at that hour there are not many of them.  i was almost at the exit where i get off when i saw a very bright white light on what looked like a big chunky square in the sky ahead and to my right.  the shape was not easily seen because of the brightness of the light but it didn't seem to extend beyond the lights.  while some of the square's lights stayed lit constantly, some flashed.  the light was much higher than a cell tower would be, but lower than an airplane.  this area is rural with mostly trees and brush -- no buildings.  the light remained stationary in the sky - no movement at all.  i opened my window (despite 32 degree temps), but heard no sound.  i watched the light so long i missed my exit and remained on the highway.  then suddenly the lights all just blinked off.  again, there was no noise at all.

at that hour of the morning, with a full moon, the sky was beautiful, so i was probably paying more attention.  because of my unusual schedule, i've seen lots of shooting stars, etc.  i studied astronomy in college, so sky watching is something i really like to do. this, however, was totally unlike anything i've ever seen.  i am certain this was not a plane (too low, no movement and way too bright) and not a helicopter (too big, no noise, and way too bright), and the sudden blinking off was odd too.  i suppose i noticed it because it had incredibly bright lights like burning magnesium -- very unusual in that dark, remote area.  when i first saw it, i was pretty convinced it was a ufo. my reaction - i felt like i needed to be a calm, critical observer to give a credible account.
content.summary: Chunky square with constant and flashing very bright white lights

content.detailedDescription: This picture was obtained from a friend. it is of he and a friend. they did not witness the event, but found the anomaly in the photo. they report that they have the original negatives in storage and that the disc does not appear on pre or post pics. i asked them permission to report this, and they are open to answering questions. coincidentally the one who took the photo reported that she began having her migraines shortly after this photo was taken...
content.summary: Disc shaped object with notable trail. see picture

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving uphill (north) on cold canyon road to reach mulholland highway.  my peripheral vision caught something like an aircraft in the clear blue sky as viewed between two houses.  it appeared to be stationary and not quite like an airliner.  it made me think of a blimp.  

i lost sight of the object behind a house.  twenty seconds later i was driving west on mulholland highway and saw a large thin white shape like an elongated cigar hovering in the sky above the mountains.  it may have been tapered at the ends.  it was larger than an airliner and appeared to be stationary or moving very slowly.  there were no lights or markings on the object.

i continued to drive west, alternately looking at the road ahead and the object every two to three seconds.  i wanted to pull over, but did not want to look away from the object for very long, so i kept driving.  after about the sixth time of looking back and forth the object disappeared.  i did not see it disappear.  i had looked at the road for two to three seconds and when i looked back for the object, it was gone.  in the object's former location i saw a small roundish patch of what looked like turbulent air, or a blurry place in the sky.

from the first moment i saw the object i felt somewhat excited and very sure that it was not an ordinary aircraft.  i felt somewhat mesmerized by the whole event. i have been thinking about it frequently.

i am a scientist employed by the state of california.
content.summary: Stationary long thin white object hovered then disappeared leaving small blurry patch in sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and two of my friends were standing outside off my house talking. i looked in the distance and we all could see this huge blinking light almost like a star rising straight up from the woods across the street from my house. it got to a certain point in the sky and the bright white light stopped and then we seen blue,green,yellow,red,orange, and more colors jus goin around in a circle around the saucer shapped object. then it started moving... you could hear this loud rumble in the sky and it was sooooooooo loud like rocket booster kicked on but it was moving slow at 1st. it was like basically right above us then we all started freakin out cuz we didnt kno what was goin on haa it was jus goin slow for a while prolly a good 2 er 3 mins n then it jus basically disipeared. i am 100 percent positive that was an alien ship and so are my both friends... if you seen it you would totally believe 100 percent in aliens. i kno aliens are here on earth right this second as we speak. the reptillians and greys are here. and we all are played with and brainwashed everyday. soon enough we all will know the truth hopefully... but back to my sighting. after i seen it i ran in and told my mom but she didnt believe me hahaha every night after that i went out with a camera so i could try to prove her wrong fer like a month er two straight but i never seen anything quite like that. u can say im crazy or whatever but [cms/tg/pd] i kno what i saw n what i saw was 100 percent an alien ship. probally a mother ship since the size of it was so humonguos. its funny too cuz a week later i heard that 1 of my neighbors a couple streets down the road heard the rumble in the sky cuz it was so loud n seen it too but i never got to talk to her personally... but im happy i found a site where i can finally let people kno thats aliens are really out their. you all have to open up your eyes n see whats really goin on here.Thank you..
content.summary: Huge blinkin light at 1st then tons of colors and it was a disc like a mile away

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving off of the bay bridge (westbound into sf), i saw up high in the daytime sky (at approx 10/11 oclock) a stationary light which looked like a bright star.  the object did not appear to move, but the strength of its light varied.  this area is not in the normal zone for commercial aircraft.  it was far too high to be to/from sfo, far too north for san jose airport and far too west for oakland airport.  i saw the object for a couple minutes and then in the near instant it took for me to look at the time (3:04 pm) it disappeared.
content.summary: Star-like object, varying strength of light

content.detailedDescription:
/deputy responded to area of sighting, saw lights in sky between city of holtville and el centro, ca. report is on log at sheriff's dept., imperial county.

make contact with sgt. mike leon, duty office/patrol sgt. @ 1-760-339-6311
content.summary: As told by deputy sheriff

content.detailedDescription:
on the morning of september 17,2009 at 4:10am, i was awake again from not being able to sleep. i walked outside into my backyard to get some fresh air and stretch; it was very warm outside still being a really hot summer here in the sacramento valley. now, i live right next to mather airport, i used to be a pilot, i've worked at different airports around the area, and i've lived in this area all of my 32 years on this earth, including when mather airport was mather afb. i know airplanes and i know helicopters and i've flown both. i looked up at the stars as i often do if i can't sleep early in the morning when the stars are shining their brightest. a moving light caught my eye in the south-eastern sky. my first initial thought was, an airplane, at first glance. i live right, right next to the airport, and aircraft fly in and out constantly. but this craft was especially bright, blinking several different colors very rapidly, with kind of a disk shape with a glowing-ish ball underneath...And then it stopped moving. at this point the craft appeared to be maybe 1 or more miles away; it was 4am and no moon, lights or other objects to reference. the creepiest thing for me to admit (as chills consume me now), is when i actually looked directly at the craft, it stopped. i had the strongest feeling i was being watched during the entire encounter. the ufo never made a single sound and there were no passing aircraft for the whole sighting which lasted roughly 25-30 minutes. at first i thought i was seeing things, maybe because i was so groggy and sleepy, but the craft began to move around the south-eastern sky with rapid movements up, down, side to side, forwards, backwards, but never leaving this area of the sky. i had my cell-phone in my pocket so i called my wife outside to confirm i wasn't hallucinating. she confirmed that i wasn't nuts. she grabbed me the video camera and i recorded this object for rougly 25minutes. i was overwhelmed, shocked, mystfied... and scared mostly. scared because my wife and i had an encounter of the 3rd kind exactly ten years earlier, in a little 400sq ft cottage (our first house), exactly five miles away, also way out in the country. we don't talk about it to this day. my wife gets very upset if i even bring it up. to this day i'm not allowed to talk about it with her. it's too long of an event to post.
  now, at this time i haven't released the video to anyone and i've only shown family and close family friends. i had to use two tapes to record it, because of course with my luck the first tape ran out after about 10 min. the second tape has some "night shot" footage and some flashlight-light shining on the trees that gives perspective on the depth of feild in relation to the object; but the end of the first tape has the most dramatic shots of the object moving all over the sky in a fast dance of movements, almost as if it heard me egging it on to "move" more for video. i was having a difficult time keeping the object in frame, focused, or just not bouncing around by my body movements, so i held the camera perfectly still and thats when it's movements went bizerk, so you can really see it's radical direction changing. the object never really "flew" away, or left, but seemed to (please don't think i'm crazy) move in front of a star and i guess become invisible or something...I don't know. i do know that everyone i show the video to is shocked and dumbfounded by what they see. i would like to share this video, but not over the internet. i'm already nervous not knowing what could happen if i send this information. i'm not nuts, crazy, loony, whacko or paranoid, just wigged out by these events maybe even traumatized. 
   so now what....Whats next.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very bright, flashing multi-colored lights on body, glowing ball-like bottom light thingy, moving all over the sky very fast stop/turns

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were outside his house in angier, nc. we were just looking at the sky when we noticed what we thought was an unusually bright star. we watched it for a few moments when we noticed that it was slowly moving down toward the treeline. it was not blinking, or flashing like any conventional aircraft, so we continued to carefully watch it for about 10 minutes until it moved below the trees and out of sight.

we decided to stay outside to see if we could catch another glimpse of the object. after about 5 minutes, we saw 4 black helicopters with spotlights come from behind us, moving in a large circle.

just as the helicopters moved out of sight, while we were standing in the road in front of the house, a loud, high pitched, almost "flock-of-bird-like" sound, pass right over our heads. it sounded like it was less than 20 feet away, but due to the fact i've never heard a sound like it before, i cant judge distance acurately.

after some time, we decided to head inside and with a last glance around the sky, saw a red light moving across the sky above the treeline. at first i thought it was a helicopter, but when i looked at it through the binoculars, i saw that the light was solid, not blinking, so i'm not really sure about the nature of it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Moving ball of light, followed by 5 low, circling helicopters, and a strange, loud noise.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the loblaws parking lot - the real canadian superstore at oxford and hyde park in london ontario canada.  i was with my husband picking up a few things for our canadian thanksgiving weekend before the holiday.  i was exiting the parking lot and heading to our car when i looked up into the sky and noticed a ufo object that appeared to look like a globe of orange in the sky directly to the south of the store.  i have no idea what type of distance away it would have been but it was clearly not typical of an air plane as it was stationary - i felt as if it knew i noticed it.  i of course pointed it out to my husband and we both just looked in awe of this object trying to make sense of it.  we watched this object that was stationary for about 4-5 minutes and then all the sudden it went directly up into the sky in a matter of seconds until it was gone.  

i was in complete shock. i went home directly after - we live about a 4 minute drive from the store and of course went outside immediately to look at the sky more.  all of the sudden there were military planes cris-crossing over our home moving very fast doing formation patterns for about an hour.  the jets flew back and forth in pairs.  there were two sets of pairs.  these jets made no noise which for jets moving as fast as these were rather interesting considering jets generally make quite a large amount of noise.  i have no doubt whatsoever that this was a ufo sighting and i must say i can't believe there was no talk about this from anyone else?  if anyone saw this orange globe i would like to discuss it in more detail.
london ontario canada
content.summary: Glowing orange ball - over real canadian superstore rcs london, ontario, oct. 11, 2009

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in the cornfield just playing around with the camera. 
i did not even see the object until i downloaded the pictures onto my computer. the bottom looks like it is glowing white with a little green and the top looks blue. it only showed up in this one picture.
i thought this is cool, i got something pretty neat here. i emailed the picture to a few friends to get opinions. everyone says it looks like a ufo.
content.summary: Did not see this object when taking pictures

content.detailedDescription: I am 14 years old and i went outside to make sure by bb sister and my moms boyfriends son comes in the house. i came to about the edge of my driveway and i saw my moms boyfriends son. i turned  to my right to look at the stars when suddently i see a star that appears to be too low to be one.I rush into the house to get the camera i borrowed from school for photography to take a picture.When i got outside it was split in two. there was one above the other. you could easily tell that these were no stars. the two were not exactly above each other but more like one was higher than the other. the one that was higher started moving more too the right at a fast pace. the one below it slowly followed about 2 or 3 minutes behind the other.I cept taking pictures until it was out of my sight. i only have two good photos of them. after they left i got my sister in the house and my moms boyfriends son too.After i go to 911 .Com to report what i saw. then i started looking on google to see what you were supppost to do when you saw a ufo. after that i went back outside to look at the stars again but when i get outside my door i see the moon and it is closer and more oddly colored than usuall(i take pictures of this also). about 5 minutes later i see a sigar shaped craft about 20 to 30 feet away from me.I try to take pictures of it but the camera would not take them right.I tried my best.After that i go back on the internet and i stumble upon this sight and now i am writing this to whoever it may concern.However, since i do not have the cord to download the pictures, someone will half to come see them.
content.summary: It looked like a star, but it split in two and started to move.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to shop-rite in franklin, i seen some lights that did not belong where they were, i said to my wife, who was in the car with me, are they halloween lights, they look kinda strange, then suddenly it started moving toward the se, they were about 35-feet in the air above the stores in the mini mall, 2- outboard lights that were green and a red light in the front...I walked up to a cop and pointed to the lights that seem to just flow in front of us, about 50-feet away, he didn't seem to care, he was to busy making up an accident report...It started to move toward the se again very slowly i walked as it moved, and keep up with it, i heard what seemed like a humming noise... it stayed over the building as it moved toward the se, a couple of house wife's were hysterical upon seeing this thing, they asked me what it was, and i said i don't know....I started to wonder did i just see a ufo??  what the hell was that, it was to dark to make out any distinguish marks...The object continuted to move se toward ogdensburg n.J.
content.summary: Unknown object over mini mall, hovering and moving very slowly.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready to go to bed at 4 in the morning. i was hearing some weird noises as i was eating a midnight snack. i then went to my room when i was done. i sat down on my bed and looked out the window (which is right above the head of the bed) to look at the stars. suddenly i saw this star get bright and it looked like it was coming right at me. i woke my husband up while saying "what is that thing?" he saw it and said that it was just a star. it then started dimming out. he looked up again and said "yeah it's gone!" i layed down scared and shaky and said "maybe it was just a meteorite." two minutes later i looked up again and it was dimming out again. i pulled my blanket over my head and had a rapid heart beat. i thought i was going to get abducted. i saw them and they might have seen me too,i was thinking. i lost sight of the object not wanting to look anymore. i then fell asleep. did anyone else in the san fernando valley see this too? it was like at 4:30 in the morning on november 3,2009.
content.summary: Fading bright light

content.detailedDescription:
I am posting this report in hopes that someone else may have seen this object and be willing to report it.

november 2, 2009 at 7:45 p.M.  

i was outside with my dogs, standing on the porch steps facing south, watching a commercial jet at approximately 70 degrees agl, which was heading east to west.  i retrieved my binoculars from the house and when i turned around, the commercial jet now had on it's extremely bright landing light.  i thought that was rather strange, as there is no large airport near here.  the closest larger airport is about 60 miles w/sw, in abilene.

i watched the jet for about 1 minute, when suddenly the landing light was turned off and the jet continued west. as i wondered why a commercial jet would have it's landing light on then shut it off in flight, i noticed a bright, large, orange golden light to my south/southwest at approximately 15 degrees agl. this light did not waver, did not blink or strobe.  it remained constant.  the light appeared to be more than twice the size of jupiter and at first i thought it might be the international space station but something wasn't quite right and and the object moved slower than the iss.  whatever this was, it was in our atmosphere and appeared to be between 1 and 2 miles from my location.  

i began watching through my binoculars and i decided to see if there would be a reaction if i said something. i spoke out loud and said, "here i am, come closer."  the object stopped abruptly.  hovered for a few seconds and then in an instant, it continued on at the same speed as before.  

when i first noticed the light, it appeared to be heading to the northeast, stopped when i spoke and then took a more easterly direction.  the object held a steady course and speed to the east.  i could not see any wings, tail, or other structured features, just a disc, or oval shaped light.

the object itself, was a constant golden orange light, like an ember when fanned.  there were no other lights.  at one point the object appeared to look like a cross laying horizontal, with the cross member towards the front, much like an airplane.  but as i watched through the binoculars, the object appeared to take on a disc shape, before it passed from my field of sight and behind the trees to my southeast.  

i tried several times to take photos with my digital camera but to no avail.

i must note that i heard the distinct sound of the jet as it passed overhead but i heard no sound from this other object and am not aware of any conventional aircraft that glow an orange golden color.  my feelings during and after the sighting was disappointment, in that i had no photo to back up the sighting.

the sighting lasted for slightly under 5 minutes.  i came in and called a friend that lives 6 miles to my east.  i told her to go look outside and she would be able to see the object but she wouldn't do it. she just laughed and said it's probably already gone.  in other words, she does not believe things like this exist and was not willing to look.

it was not the iss or the htv satellite.  i checked the human space flight tracking website to make sure.

i have included a depiction of what i saw.

i would like to add that the same morning, at 5:54 a.M., an unknown object passed over my residence, upset one of my dogs, caused my cell phone to activate, which in turn affected my clock radio (radio was turned off).  the radio produced a short burst of what sounded mike morse code.  i then heard a low rumbling, humming sound, like a huge electric generator slowly passing over my home.  at one point i felt a pressure in my chest and felt "pinned" to the bed.  as the sound faded into the distance, i was released and don't remember anything else until i woke up a while later.  i asked my spouse if he remembered anything.  he said he did remember the cell phone/radio incident but not the sound passing over the house.
thank you for your time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing golden orange flying object traversed the evening sky

content.detailedDescription: I was out having a cigarette on my roof deck in south philadelphia around 1:35 am nov. 2nd 2009. it was a little cloudy, but the moon was very bright, so visibility was good in terms of lighting. i was sitting, looking at the sky, when something moving caught my eye from the north. i didn't know what it was at first. i could tell it wasn't a plane, as i see many every night and am very familiar with their appearance at various altitudes at night. it was coming from the north going south. i thought maybe it was some kind of balloon or kite, but as it got closer, almost directly above me, i could see it was neither of these things. although details of its surface were difficult to make out, the shape was very clear. it was a light color, maybe grayish, and in a cylindrical shape. it was difficult to tell exactly how high up it was, but it was lower than most of the clouds in the sky, and didn't seem to be that far away. this makes the size difficult to judge, but it must have been at least 100 ft. it was a very quiet night and it was clear this thing was not making a sound. the objects flight position is difficult to explain. the cylinder was parallel to the ground, but it was moving at about a 45 degree angle from its flight path. at some point while watching i had stood up, and as it passed over it looked like it was emitting several points of light along its length. these lights were whitish, but were not very bright at all. after it moved a little south of me it entered into some lower clouds, and i was unable to see it again. i sat back down, completely shocked and trying to figure out what i had just see. i looked back up hoping to see further evidence of what had just happened. after about a minute or so my eye caught a similar movement coming from the same direction, but a little more east of me. when i saw the second one coming i felt shocked. after the first disappeared i was trying to convince myself it had been some sort of floating debris, my imagination, or a prank as i had seen the story about the balloon boy a couple weeks ago. but when the second appeared i was immediately convinced that non of these were true. at first it appeared very similar to the first. it moved silently and steadily southward. after about ten seconds or so of observation i saw it was emitting lights just as the first one did, however, at this point the object seemed to change its shape. it seemed to curl up into a spiral like circle, but it s speed or path did not change. as it proceeded south this one too entered into some low clouds and i didn't see it again.
content.summary: I witnessed two cylindrical ufos over south philadelphia. both moved silently emitting lights and one changed form.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my friends house watching the ufc fight on october 24th, 2009 in corona, ca. after the fight was over, we all (at least 6 people witnessed this) decided to go out front of his house. being out there for a couple minutes conversating, my friends dad saw a light at a nearby mountain we call "skyline". at first, everyone assumed it was a car driving on the mountain on our side of the ridgeline. but soon after we all realized it was definitely not a vehicle. it looked like a red/orange fireball. a circular orb slowly moving around. then all of a sudden it zips quickly, god only knows how fast, into the air above the mountain and just sits there. everyone saw this and was in shock immediately. it started hovering horizontally across the sky. at this point i realized that the light was pulsating, and once in awhile flickered. after about 2 minutes, it brightened up then slowly faded away and disapeared instantly. i can definitely tell that by watching this redish light fade away, it was obviously traveling away from my point of view. after this, everyone wasnt sure if what we all saw was real, which clearly was since we all stood together watching this 'thing'. my friends dad then said, in quote, "this is just shocking, completely real, and trippy". 
this was my personal experience seeing a ufo. and i have been told times and times before by people that they have previously seen ufos in corona, ca. and after viewing the episode of "ufo hunters" and their visit to corona, i am sure of what i saw, and what we all saw.
thank you for taking the time reading my story.
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: A flying object which appeared to look like a red/orange orb

content.detailedDescription: The object was just hovering over the sw portion of ottumwa. the night was clear, the moon was high and so were the stars. this was way too low to be a star and way too bright. it was very very bright with a white light all around it. saw this as my brother and i left work. i thought it could be the same ufo i have previously seen twice already. but it was not flashing its lights at us this time. we just went home since we have seen it before and it was late.
content.summary: Hovering bright round shape above ottumwa

content.detailedDescription: I have  hunted deer in this area for several years. the first sighting was about 15 years ago. it was just a light in the sky. no movement. observed. two years later at the same location  i saw a light  stationary  that then started to move. as it started  northwest upward it changed color from silver and started to emit flame like tail start. it gained speed and went out out of  sight into the clouds.The third sighting was the  two silver balls connedted together. moving  approx. 25 mph at 500 ft. above me. i have seen nothing else then as i have not been in that area.
content.summary: Two round balls connected together. silver in color. moving slowly north at 20 mph. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Are these chem-trails or regular con trails?  i feel like i've been seeing a lot of these over gunnison lately.  they hang around for a long time.  they basically just eventually float away like clouds.
content.summary: Chem-trail?

content.detailedDescription:
i begin my story with who i share this bizzar incident with.My lovely mother and my 2 great brothers dennis and allen, traveling south bound on canton center road.
   while driving home i noticed several cars parked along the side of the road. what caught my attention was a black man with an afro stairing up into the sky. i immediatley looked up and noticed a strange object. as we were driving tourds this slow craft moving from east to west, where we were no further then a mile away and being a quarter mile high, i told everyone to look up. as im explaining what im looking at, allen goes from sarcasm to shock. dennis instantly starts to stutter and my mom replies (omg).
   after driving a mile up, we approach our street and turn right into the sub. at this time the craft is right in front of us moving in the same direction. as our street curves to the left, the craft continous straight over what was then, miles of corn fields. as we pull into our driveway, the craft being 3/4 mile out, we noticed that the entire ufo had turned into a shade of orange.
   scared out of our minds, we quickly close the garage door,went inside and closed the blinds. my mom picked up the phone to call our dad at work. imposible to get a hold of our father being that he worked on the assembly line at gm, we got a hold of our aunt. my mother told her we're coming over and will explain everything when we get there. 
   after being at the house for twenty min, we started our drive. along the way the ufo was never insite. 15 min away in westland where our aunt lives we pull into the apartments and park. after getting out of the vehical, my mother and allen reach the door first. as dennis and i are dragging our feet along, i kid you not. the most incredible thing happens.
   as we were looking back in the direction we came from. we saw a white ball of light about a 1/4 size of the moon shooting straight up into the sky. i know to this time 2009 that there is nothing on earth that can leave our atmosphere and vanish in a second like this object had done.
content.summary: 30 yards across. twenty ft high. metallic, big square blue,red,yellow lights moving around the exterrior of the craft with total silence

content.detailedDescription: I had gone outside to cool off as the house was warm. i had noticed how the full moon had made the stars rather hard to see. after a few minutes i was on my way back inside when i heard a bird chirp. i looked straight up and saw a large object with a dark shimmering appearance gliding directly overhead traveling fron north to south at what i would say was about 1000 ft and would estimate the speed at about 50 to 60 mph. the closest comparison i can make to the shape is that of a b-2 although the slow flight speed and the fact that there was absolutely no sound baffles me. i watched it until it faded into the night sky at distance and never saw any lights on the object.
content.summary: Unlit  large dark object gliding silently overhead about 1000 ft up

content.detailedDescription:
Well,i woke up about 2:30 a.M.,smoked cig.,glanced out bedrm window.Above this huge pine tree-about 300ft.,i seen what looked like a big flock of extremely white birds flying in a jagged v formation.I say out loud(no friggin way!!),.My first thought, oh, a flock of geese.Well,no.1-geese swawk like mad when they fly over,plus they are a lot more grey.Anyway,it was eerily quiet.,(we live next to freeway),.
i was just mesmerized by this,i couldn't take my eyes off of it,(or i would have ran to the next window over to my left,to get another look.)it finally went behinds clouds.This all happened in about 15 secs.It has really been bothering me.My mind is trying to tell me it was birds,(but it was so un-natural to see).I am not sure what i saw, yet!I felt so in awe.,curious,and a little frightened.I have always believed that we were not alone.,with such huge galaxies,and etc.,after this i am more interested in finding out all i can.I am going on 55,and just lately i have been more curious than ever.Thanx
content.summary: First impression.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of nov. 15th, 1973, four objects were sited off the coast of florida from the west palm beach, jai lai fronton. stacked at a 

45 deg angle in relation to each other, they were observed by hundreds of people looking out in a easterly direction. then the lowest one 

in the pattern did a sudden 90 deg dive from its trajectory, straight down at a unbelievable speed. then the 2nd one in the pattern did a 

similar dive into the same area. same for the 3rd and 4th objects in this group. i know there are no manmade objects that could fly at 

that speed ...And maintain the speed thru a 90 deg turn and power dive to the deck (ocean surface). missiles don't even move that fast.
content.summary: 4 objects off of  west palm beach, fl. 1973.
